FirstRule.Title: Booking time
FirstRule.FirstParagraph: Booking is not allowed anytime because of university classes
FirstRule.SecondParagraph: Usually you cannot book a room from 7:00 to 19:00

SecondRule.Title: Available rooms
SecondRule.FirstParagraph: You can book only rooms with Yellow access
SecondRule.SecondParagraph: You can see available for booking rooms by clicking "See rooms"

ThirdRule.Title: Booking time
ThirdRule.FirstParagraph: You can book one room not more than 3 horus per day
ThirdRule.SecondParagraph: In case you need more, other people can book it again

FourthRule.Title: Please respect
FourthRule.FirstParagraph: Your booking can be removed by administrators for some important events or classes
FourthRule.SecondParagraph: You will be informed in this case

My.Title: My Bookings
My.ConfirmFull: Do you really want to delete
